content.rendered:
The Oven Cleaning Company Specialises in Rangehood Cleaning. We clean any size or design from small under cupboard mounted Rangehoods to large stainless steel canopy style units.

The exterior is degreased and polished using our unique eco friendly degreasers. The filters are removed and the grease and grime is completely removed with our eco friendly degreasing process located in our van.

If your entire Rangehood does not need a clean we will be happy to clean the filters only.

We can also replace most Rangehood globes if required.
